alert.note: Alert for East Polk; North Clearwater; Red Lake; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 11:19AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Red Lake, east central Polk, south central Beltrami and central Clearwater Counties through NOON CDT... At 1119 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oklee, or 28 miles southeast of Thief River Falls, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Trail around 1130 AM CDT. Olga and Gully around 1135 AM CDT. Weme and Gonvick around 1145 AM CDT. Clearbrook around 1150 AM CDT. Leonard and Bagley around 1200 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; North Clearwater; Red Lake; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
